original_text: As they passed by in the morning, they saw the fig tree withered away to its roots.
korean_text: 그들이 아침에 지나갈 때에 무화과나무가 뿌리째 마른 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: As they passed by in the morning
they saw the fig tree withered away to its roots.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 뿌리까지 말라 버린 무화과나무를 보았습니다.
